title: Heart Wreck
description: CamelliaAfter being stood up, I didn’t plan on meeting anyone during my Hawaii vacation. But on the first night, I pour my heart out to a mysterious man, and he’s all about helping me heal. Over the course of our vacation, we form a connection through our late-night confessions, which soon turns physical because we both seem to want it. Before I know it, I’m head over heels for Cillian, but he’s holding back, unable to get over the one who got away.I believe he’s worth fighting for, and that’s exactly what I’m going to do.CillianCamellia is broken—possibly even more than me—but I enjoy listening to her because it also helps me. After spending several days together, it never crossed my mind that I would crave a physical relationship, but she’s impossible to resist. With each passing moment, I grasp the potential consequences of revealing the true reason I’m in Hawaii.My lack of self-control has turned this trip into a messy romantic entanglement. I’m falling for her, but we can’t have a future.*** Heart Wreck is a steamy contemporary romance. TW: The mention of a car wreck, death, physical and emotional abuse, thoughts of suicide. Recommended for 18+. ***
author: Melinda Hazen
